title: (x) Razorfish Logo Typeface? - modified Leakz (based on Helvetica Extended) {Katie K}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123042005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/razorfish_3437.gif)

Any idea what typeface this is? Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [razorfish.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123042005/http:/typophile.com/files/razorfish_0.gif) | 759 bytes |
author: imperium

comments.content: Actually I know the answer to this as I work there. It started off as the typeface LEAKZ (which we have floating around in the office but can't find it online. It's a lot like a helvetica neue extended), but then it was modified to what it is now. They took off pieces here & there to smooth it out.
